instructions: This sheet is intended for heroic-level 6th Edition Hero System Games such as *Fantasy Hero* or *Star Hero.* The sheet is designed to work in a basic Roll20 environment and requires no support APIs. Features include a full character point accounting of characteristics, skills, powers, and complications. Full sheet instructions in the [Readme](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/HeroSystem6eHeroic/README.md).
